sense.def:
A shelter
je majhna stavba ali pokrit prostor, v katerem ljudje poiščejo zavetje pred slabim vremenom ali nevarnostjo.

Kadar prostor
provides shelter
, ponuja ljudem zavetje pred slabim vremenom ali nevarnostjo.

seg.quote: We waited in the shelter of the trees.

sense.def:
To shelter in a place
pomeni biti na nekem kraju, da smo na varnem pred slabim vremenom ali nevarnostjo.

seg.quote: It is natural to shelter from a storm.

sense.def:
Kadar neki kraj ali stvar
is sheltered by something
, jo nekaj varuje pred vetrom in dežjem.

seg.quote: This wide alley is sheltered by plane trees.

sense.def:
To shelter someone
pomeni skriti nekoga, kadar ga ljudje iščejo.

seg.quote: Some villagers are prepared to shelter wanted men.
